measures.upright: Always keep in the upright position.
measures.water: Do not add extra quantities of pure water. (Pure water level must not be more than 1.5 cm above the plates.)
measures.goggles: During battery maintenance (addition of water, cleaning, battery charge), absolutely wear protective goggles suitable with working conditions.
measures.clothing: In case of any possible acid splash risk, wear protective clothing.

procedures.contact: In case of contact with eyes or skin wash with plenty of water.
procedures.ingestion: Ingestion: Drink plenty of water and milk. Consult a physician.
procedures.gases: Operating batteries emit highly flammable hydrogen and oxygen gases.
procedures.spark: Do not smoke or avoid any sources and acts which may cause sparks near batteries which are being charged, operating on the vehicle, or stopped after a long operation period.
procedures.devices: Use all devices with great care.

general.title: General Storage
general.dry: Always store in a dry and cool place in the upright position. (10°C to 25°C).
general.pallet: Place batteries on a wood pallet for avoiding direct contact with concrete ground.

charge.title: Charge Level Monitoring
charge.sale: Charge level of the battery must be greater than 12.6V before sale.
charge.minimum: During storage, the minimum voltage must be 12.4V.
charge.damage: For preventing permanent damage, unpack and charge at 16.1V and 1/20Cn current if voltage is low.

installation.title: Installation Steps
installation.verify: Verify battery compatibility with vehicle manual
installation.install: Install new battery (connect positive cable first)
